channel.title: Parcour?
channel.description:
Sorry if i misspelled that :P I recently noticed many people talking about it and i wanted to know if anyone does it. If so, what are your experiences with it? And more importantly how did you learn it? How old were you? How long have you been doing it for?
I know Uriko does.
Edit: I can see i limited this a bit too much, if you dont do it what are your thoughts on it?

item.title: Parcour?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

It’s only good if it’s done professionally. Seeing little kids on youtube that jump over a railing and then roll over the floor is just gay.

Read full topic

item.title: Parcour?
item.dc:creator: @Baros_Rocks Baros Rocks
item.description:
@Baros_Rocks wrote:

Looks pretty cool although I don’t really have the balls to start.

Read full topic

item.title: Parcour?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

I’m gonna be getting into some pretty hard shit soon hopefully, we ran from some guys using parkour n jumping off fences n shit and lost them lol. Gets the adrenaline pumping

Read full topic

item.title: Parcour?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Isn’t it Parkour? Anyway… I’ve tried it. It’s pretty fun. Nothing hardcore mind. Just jumping on big stuff and hanging from the edges and spinning round… long runs where we jump over lots of obstacles. Just basic stuff. It is fun, but like spankjava said, it can be scary if you fall.

Read full topic

item.title: Parcour?
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

Well i tried it and enjoyed doing until i tried a back flip of a wall and landed on my neck i wasn’t hurt but its stopped me from doing but i spose getting hurt is going to come along if you do it

Read full topic
